prompts: Create a whimsical poison-type Pokemon that has a bubbly body and emits colorful fumes.
Show me a unique Pokemon with an unusual shape, primarily purple with hints of yellow accents.
Imagine a creature that thrives in urban areas, with a round body and a mischievous personality.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a floating gas ball, with a playful demeanor and toxic traits.
Generate an image of a dual-type Pokemon that embodies both poison and fairy elements in its design.
I want to see a Pokemon that combines a polluted city vibe with an adorable appearance.
Make a character that represents the essence of pollution, with a charming yet eerie look.
